description: TRESemmé CONDITIONER REPAIR & PROTECT 7 350 MLEvery gorgeous style starts with strong, healthy hair. Our TRESemme´ Repair & Protect 7 system visibly repairs seven different types of damage – brushing, blow-drying, bleaching, coloring, curling, flat-ironing and braiding with each use – to keep your hair style-ready.Used together with the Repair & Protect 7 Shampoo, formulated with Biotin Complex, Repair and Protect 7 Conditioner treats visible damage instantly, helps repair the hair fiber from within and strengthens your locks against breakage.WHY REPAIR & PROTECT 7?You can blow-dry, brush & braid. You can bleach, colour, straighten & curl. Healthy hair or smooth style? Have both. VISIBLY REPAIR 7 TYPES OF STYLING DAMAGE IN 1 USE^> BLOW DRYING > STRAIGHTENING> COLOURING > CURLING> BLEACHING> BRUSHING > BRAIDINGOur Repair & Protect 7 system^, with BIOTIN COMPLEX, visibly repairs styling damage and with continued use, strengthens each strand inside and out*. Hair will be protected so you can keep styling.^TRESemmé Repair & Protect 7 Shampoo & Conditioner vs non-conditioning shampoo*Less breakageNEED AN EXTRA BOOST OF PROTECTION?For added damage protection use our TRESemmé Heat Defence Spray.OUR PHILOSOPHYFrom our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salonTRESemmé is dedicated to creating haircare products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylist and salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day.TRESemmé. Professional. At your fingertips.Goes Well With: TRESemmé Repair & Protect 7 ShampooRepair & Protect 7 - now With Biotin ComplexWork to Counteract seven types of styling damage: bleaching, braiding, curling, brushing. Coloring, blowdrying and straighteningSpecially formulated for brittle hairBiotin Complex work in the system to treats visible damage from withinto give you style ready hair that is visibly stronger and healthierUse it together with TRESemmé  Repair & Protect 7 Shampoo for best result
name: Tresemme Conditioner Repair & Protect 350mL
